flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=6000.0>>6000.0 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=168>>168 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $6000.0 - $150 = $<<6000.0-150=5850.0>>5850.0 per head.
He would make $5850.0 x 168 = $<<5850.0*168=982800.0>>982800.0 at the lowered price.
He could have made $6000.0 x 168 = $<<6000.0*168=1008000.0>>1008000.0 at the original price.
He would lose $1008000.0 - $982800.0 = $<<1008000.0-982800.0=25200.0>>25200.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600.0, not 6000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
